revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #52 Chilan |image = [[File:Chilan.png]] |caption = This Berry can be cored out and dried to make a whistle. Blowing through its hole makes an indescribable sound. |growtime = 2h 0m 0s |harvest = 10 berries |replant = 5% |points = 500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *25 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chilan''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Chople]] with at least 3 [[Chople]]. The surrounded [[Chople]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 4 mins || 23 mins 50 secs || 49 mins 30 secs || 2 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChilanTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChilanTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChilanTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Chilan berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Chople.png|30px]]
